original_text: And the king and Jehoiada gave it to those who had charge of the work of the house of the Lord, and they hired masons and carpenters to restore the house of the Lord, and also workers in iron and bronze to repair the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 왕과 여호야다가 그 돈을 여호와의 전 감독자에게 주어 석수와 목수를 고용하여 여호와의 전을 보수하며 또 철공과 놋쇠공을 고용하여 여호와의 전을 수리하게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: And the king and Jehoiada gave it
to those who had charge of the work of the house of the Lord
and they hired masons and carpenters
to restore the house of the Lord
and also workers in iron and bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 또 철과 놋으로 만드는 자들도 고용하여

sentences.original_text: to repair the house of the Lord
